Download

Milestone 2

This is the current and newly released stable version of Supertux. It features much more levels, features and better gameplay than the old stable version.

Windows

  • supertux-0.4.0-setup.exe

Mac OS X

  • supertux-0.4.0-macosx-universal.dmg (Universal binary)
  • supertux-0.4.0-macosx.dmg (PPC only)

Source Code

  • supertux-0.4.0.tar.bz2

Milestone 1

This is the old stable stable version of SuperTux, also called Milestone 1. It is very stable, and the best choice for extremely low resource machines. This version is approximately 12 years old.

Windows

  • supertux-0.1.3-setup.exe

Mac OS X

  • supertux-0.1.3-macosx-universal.dmg (Universal binary)
  • supertux-0.1.3-macosx.dmg (PPC only)

Linux

  • supertux-0.1.3.x86.package (x86 only)

Source Code

  • supertux-0.1.3.tar.bz2


Git Snapshot/Beta Version

The Git snapshot is an beta version of SuperTux. If you run accross any issues please report them in our Bug Tracker.

Windows

  • supertux-0.3.5a-win32-setup.exe
  • supertux-0.3.5a-win64-setup.exe

Mac OS X

  • supertux-0.3.5a-osx-intel.dmg

Source Code

  • supertux-0.3.5a.tar.bz2
